oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gone With The Wind premiere coverage - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM coverage of the Gone With The Wind world premiere, part 2. Featuring a speech by Margaret Mitchell, and interviews with attendees conducted by Jack Harris.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Jack Harris talks about the movie -- Chip Roberts talks -- Jack Harris talks -- Margaret Mitchell is introduced -- Margaret Mitchell talks -- Jack Harris interviews Calvin McPherson -- Jack Harris interviews Nora Belle Stark and Miss Scott -- Jack Harris interviews Jack Foster -- Jack Harris interviews Mrs Frank Cole Jr. -- Closing statement (Jack Harris)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Gone with the wind (Motion picture : 1939); Harris, Jack, 1911-
